title: Developer Grades
description: Leverages GitHub activity for developer profile assessment, generating a skill grade and embeddable badges.

title: Productivity Application
description: Productivity app with clean UI, fast performance, and simple scheduling features for user consistency.

title: Visual Decision Tool
description: Tool to set priorities, add options, and analyze choices with visual statistics for clearer decisions.

title: Streak Tracking
description: Application to track self-assigned tasks and build personal streaks for habit building and self-challenges.

title: Social Media App
description: Social media app with explore feed, follower suggestions, likes, posts, and more interactions.
